Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 060195 ZSK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under Section 74-902 of the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 36 to facilitate the development of a non-profit institution.
